title: massive packet loss?
body: The past 2 weeks I have been getting massive packet loss, from 30-65% making hte game practically unplayable, has anyone else been getting the same problem? I have checked my my ISP and done multiple packet loss tests to different servers andn one of them register above 1% but league is consistantly having massive amounts of packet loss. Please help.

replies.body:
Hey,

What ISP do you use and what location are you playing from?

There are lots of potential causes of packet loss - have a read over [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you haven't already and let me know how you go!

cheers,
Mindstar

Internode, Brisbane, caleld isp, pionged them 100 times result was 1% packet loss. did the test on your tech difficulties page, 0.5% packet loss, good internet connection, green lights on packet loss. Playing a agame of league, 30-60 packets loss/minute on average for the past week or 2 now. Its on ur end
Yo, do you have any applications that are running while League is?
